verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֬חַ ׀ <WH5329> To the chief Musician לִבְנֵי־ <WH1121> for the sons קֹ֬רַח <WH7141> of Korah מִזְמֽוֹר׃ <WH4210> A Psalm שִׁמְעוּ־ <WH8085> Hear זֹ֭את <WH2063> likewise כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָֽעַמִּ֑ים <WH5971> this all [ye] people הַ֝אֲזִ֗ינוּ <WH238> give ear כָּל־ <WH3605> all יֹ֥שְׁבֵי <WH3427> all [ye] inhabitants חָֽלֶד׃ <WH2465> of the world

גַּם־ <WH1571> Both בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> afflicted אָ֭דָם <WH120> man גַּם־ <WH1571> Both בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> afflicted אִ֑ישׁ <WH376> he יַ֝֗חַד <WH3162> together עָשִׁ֥יר <WH6223> rich וְאֶבְיֽוֹן׃ <WH34> and poor
פִּ֭י <WH6310> My mouth יְדַבֵּ֣ר <WH1696> shall speak חָכְמ֑וֹת <WH2454> of wisdom וְהָג֖וּת <WH1900> and the meditation לִבִּ֣י <WH3820> of my heart תְבוּנֽוֹת׃ <WH8394> [shall be] of understanding
אַטֶּ֣ה <WH5186> I will incline לְמָשָׁ֣ל <WH4912> to a parable אָזְנִ֑י <WH241> mine ear אֶפְתַּ֥ח <WH6605> I will open בְּ֝כִנּ֗וֹר <WH3658> upon the harp חִידָתִֽי׃ <WH2420> my dark saying

לָ֣מָּה <WH4100> Why אִ֭ירָא <WH3372> Wherefore should I fear בִּ֣ימֵי <WH3117> in the days רָ֑ע <WH7451> of evil עֲוֹ֖ן <WH5771> [when] the iniquity עֲקֵבַ֣י <WH6120> of my heels יְסוּבֵּֽנִי׃ <WH5437> shall compass

הַבֹּטְחִ֥ים <WH982> They that trust עַל־ <WH5921> in חֵילָ֑ם <WH2428> in their wealth וּבְרֹ֥ב <WH7230> themselves in the multitude עָ֝שְׁרָ֗ם <WH6239> of their riches יִתְהַלָּֽלוּ׃ <WH1984> and boast

אָ֗ח <WH251> his brother לֹא־ <WH3808> No פָדֹ֣ה <WH6299> by any means יִפְדֶּ֣ה <WH6299> redeem אִ֑ישׁ <WH376> None [of them] can לֹא־ <WH3808> Or יִתֵּ֖ן <WH5414> nor give לֵאלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> to God כָּפְרֽוֹ׃ <WH3724> a ransom
וְ֭יֵקַר <WH3365> [is] precious פִּדְי֥וֹן <WH6306> (For the redemption נַפְשָׁ֗ם <WH5315> of their soul וְחָדַ֥ל <WH2308> and it ceaseth לְעוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> forever
וִֽיחִי־ <WH2421> That he should still live ע֥וֹד <WH5750> on לָנֶ֑צַח <WH5331> for ever לֹ֖א <WH3808> not יִרְאֶ֣ה <WH7200> [and] not see הַשָּֽׁחַת׃ <WH7845> corruption

כִּ֤י <WH3588> for יִרְאֶ֨ה ׀ <WH7200> For he seeth חֲכָ֘מִ֤ים <WH2450> [that] wise men יָמ֗וּתוּ <WH4191> die יַ֤חַד <WH3162> likewise כְּסִ֣יל <WH3684> the fool וָבַ֣עַר <WH1198> and the brutish person יֹאבֵ֑דוּ <WH6> perish וְעָזְב֖וּ <WH5800> and leave לַאֲחֵרִ֣ים <WH312> to others חֵילָֽם׃ <WH2428> their wealth

קִרְבָּ֤ם <WH7130> Their inward בָּתֵּ֨ימוֹ ׀ <WH1004> thought [is that] their houses לְֽעוֹלָ֗ם <WH5769> [shall continue] for ever מִ֭שְׁכְּנֹתָם <WH4908> [and] their dwelling לְדֹ֣ר <WH1755> places to all וָדֹ֑ר <WH1755> generations קָֽרְא֥וּ <WH7121> they call בִ֝שְׁמוֹתָ֗ם <WH8034> after their own names עֲלֵ֣י <WH5921> and אֲדָמֽוֹת׃ <WH127> [their] lands

וְאָדָ֣ם <WH120> Nevertheless man בִּ֭יקָר <WH3366> [being] in honour בַּל־ <WH1077> will not יָלִ֑ין <WH3885> abideth נִמְשַׁ֖ל <WH4911> not he is like כַּבְּהֵמ֣וֹת <WH929> the beasts נִדְמֽוּ׃ <WH1820> [that] perish

זֶ֣ה <WH2088> This דַ֭רְכָּם <WH1870> This their way כֵּ֣סֶל <WH3689> [is] their folly לָ֑מוֹ וְאַחֲרֵיהֶ֓ם ׀ <WH310> yet their posterity בְּפִיהֶ֖ם <WH6310> their sayings יִרְצ֣וּ <WH7521> approve סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> Selah

כַּצֹּ֤אן ׀ <WH6629> Like sheep לִֽשְׁא֣וֹל <WH7585> in the grave שַׁתּוּ֮ <WH8371> they are laid מָ֤וֶת <WH4194> death יִ֫רְעֵ֥ם <WH7462> shall feed וַיִּרְדּ֘וּ <WH7287> shall have dominion בָ֤ם יְשָׁרִ֨ים ׀ <WH3477> on them and the upright לַבֹּ֗קֶר <WH1242> over them in the morning [וְצִירָם כ] (וְ֭צוּרָם <WH6736> beauty ק) לְבַלּ֥וֹת <WH1086> shall consume שְׁא֗וֹל <WH7585> in the grave מִזְּבֻ֥ל <WH2073> from their dwelling לֽוֹ׃

אַךְ־ <WH389> but אֱלֹהִ֗ים <WH430> But God יִפְדֶּ֣ה <WH6299> will redeem נַ֭פְשִׁי <WH5315> my soul מִֽיַּד־ <WH3027> from the power שְׁא֑וֹל <WH7585> of the grave כִּ֖י <WH3588> for יִקָּחֵ֣נִי <WH3947> for he shall receive סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> me Selah

אַל־ <WH408> not תִּ֭ירָא <WH3372> Be not thou afraid כִּֽי־ <WH3588> when יַעֲשִׁ֣ר <WH6238> is made rich אִ֑ישׁ <WH376> when one כִּֽי־ <WH3588> When יִ֝רְבֶּה <WH7235> is increased כְּב֣וֹד <WH3519> when the glory בֵּיתֽוֹ׃ <WH1004> of his house

כִּ֤י <WH3588> when לֹ֣א <WH3808> not בְ֭מוֹתוֹ <WH4194> For when he dieth יִקַּ֣ח <WH3947> he shall carry nothing away הַכֹּ֑ל <WH3605> all manner לֹא־ <WH3808> will not יֵרֵ֖ד <WH3381> shall not descend אַחֲרָ֣יו <WH310> after כְּבוֹדֽוֹ׃ <WH3519> his glory

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> Though נַ֭פְשׁוֹ <WH5315> his soul בְּחַיָּ֣יו <WH2416> Though while he lived יְבָרֵ֑ךְ <WH1288> he blessed וְ֝יוֹדֻ֗ךָ <WH3034> and [men] will praise כִּי־ <WH3588> when תֵיטִ֥יב <WH3190> thee when thou doest well לָֽךְ׃

תָּ֭בוֹא <WH935> He shall go עַד־ <WH5704> against דּ֣וֹר <WH1755> to the generation אֲבוֹתָ֑יו <WH1> of his fathers עַד־ <WH5704> against נֵ֝֗צַח <WH5331> alway לֹ֣א <WH3808> not יִרְאוּ־ <WH7200> see אֽוֹר׃ <WH216> light

אָדָ֣ם <WH120> Man בִּ֭יקָר <WH3366> [that is] in honour וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> without יָבִ֑ין <WH995> and understandeth נִמְשַׁ֖ל <WH4911> not is like כַּבְּהֵמ֣וֹת <WH929> the beasts נִדְמֽוּ׃ <WH1820> [that] perish
